name: images to animation
desc: Turn any number of selected images or videos into a single animation.

properties.name: Video Quality
properties.desc: The Input Animation Handling parameter tells the module how to handle videos when used as input. If Preserve all Frames has been selected every frame from the video will be present along with additional selected images. If Maintain Original Duration is selected the module will drop frames from the video to match the selected Frame Rate.

properties.name: Video Codec
properties.desc: The Input Animation Handling parameter tells the module how to handle videos when used as input. If Preserve all Frames has been selected every frame from the video will be present along with additional selected images. If Maintain Original Duration is selected the module will drop frames from the video to match the selected Frame Rate.

properties.name: Container Format
properties.desc: The Input Animation Handling parameter tells the module how to handle videos when used as input. If Preserve all Frames has been selected every frame from the video will be present along with additional selected images. If Maintain Original Duration is selected the module will drop frames from the video to match the selected Frame Rate.

properties.name: Frame Rate
properties.desc: The Frame Rate (or frame frequency) value controls the number of frames per second used to create the animation.

properties.name: Output Filename
properties.desc: The name of the output animation file.
